document.full_text: join us 8 p.m. et saturday for play-by-play coverage of ufc 129, featuring two title fights and the retirement bout for a hall of famer.
document.title: ufc 129 play-by-play: 2 title bouts; couture-machida
lines_and_colors: join us 8 p.m. et saturday for play-by-play coverage of ufc 129, featuring two title fights and the retirement bout for a hall of famer.
